item.description:
Naresh Giangrande (co-founder of Transition Totnes) will be speaking in Montpelier, VT. The full event info is here. It's about 220 miles away, a 4-hour (1-way) road trip. Emmy and I are going to go because it's an awesome opportunity to speak to one of the OG's of TT. He'll be engaging with the audience after he speaks, so line up your questions now, maybe bring your book for a signature. Emmy and I have room for 3 more. The only cost is gas money and we'll be getting home around 2 a.m., so get ready for the long haul!

The organizer, George Lisi, of Transition Vermont says there is plenty of room, and it's OK if we bring a group.
item.name: FIELD TRIP to Hear Naresh Giangrande Speak in Montpelier VT!
